title: üö® War Room - System Health Dashboard
description: Multi-service war room dashboard for overall system health monitoring. Focuses on HTTP and SQS trace metrics across all services.

definition.content:
# üö® War Room - System Health Dashboard

**Purpose**: Single pane of glass for 30-second health assessment across all services

**Trace Types**: HTTP | SQS (AWS)

**Services Monitored**:
- falcon-api-service
- app-server-internal-service
- app-server-service
- fx-api-service
- goblin-service
- goms-service
- recon-service
- rewards-api-service
- user-vault-service

**üö® Health Thresholds:**
- ‚úÖ Healthy: Error Rate < 1%, Latency p95 < 500ms
- ‚ö†Ô∏è Degraded: Error Rate 1-5%, Latency 500ms-2s
- üî¥ Critical: Error Rate > 5%, Latency > 2s

**üîç Quick Debug**: Scroll to service group ‚Üí Check HTTP/SQS metrics ‚Üí Review error breakdowns
